desc: OliAMO Extra Virgin Olive Oil is hand-picked from olive groves in the rolling hills overlooking the Adriatic in Abruzzo, Italy. The Gentile d'Chieti, Leccino and Olivastro olives are cold pressed in our family olive press. Unfiltered and Unaltered, OliAMO is high in polyphenols, and low in acidity.

layout.text: Unfiltered and unaltered Extra Virgin Olive Oil
